body_html: Indeed, assigned to the person who is almost done with it, although I believe what is being done here is softmax over a single but specific dimension (with the thought being that if you need to softmax over multiple contiguous dimensions, you can just reshape the adjacent dims).

body: Indeed, assigned to the person who is almost done with it, although I believe what is being done here is softmax over a single but specific dimension (with the thought being that if you need to softmax over multiple contiguous dimensions, you can just reshape the adjacent dims).
